titleStmt.title: A true relation of the daily proceedings and transactions of the Army in Scotland under his Excellency the Lord Gen. Cromwell. / Certified by letters from the Head-quarters at Stonehill in Scotland, Aug. 23. And published by authority.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. in the Old-baily,
